patthana13.16:1.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ
patthana13.16:1.1_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.16:1.1_2: paṭicca namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana13.16:1.1_3: namaggārammaṇo ca namaggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ
patthana13.16:1.1_4: dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggahetuko ca namaggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.16:1.1_5: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo ca namaggahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana13.16:1.1_6: hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo ca namaggahetuko ca namaggādhipati
patthana13.16:2.1: Hetuyā pañcatiṁsa, ārammaṇe chabbīsa …pe… avigate pañcatiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
